title: Healthcare Patient Portal
subtitle: Creating an accessible patient portal that simplified healthcare access
challenge: Patients struggled to book appointments online, leading to high call volumes and missed appointments. The existing portal was not accessible to users with disabilities and had a dated interface. The central question: How might we create an accessible, easy-to-use patient portal that reduces no-shows and call center volume?

designProcess.intro: We followed an inclusive design methodology, designing for accessibility from the start rather than retrofitting it later. All designs were reviewed by accessibility experts and tested with users with various disabilities.

steps.title: Research & Discovery
steps.description: Interviewed 30 patients, including users with various disabilities. Shadowed front desk staff and analyzed appointment booking patterns. Identified key barriers: complex flow, poor contrast, no keyboard navigation, and medical jargon.

steps.title: Ideation & Design
steps.description: Created an accessible design system and simplified the booking flow to 3 steps. WCAG 2.1 AA compliant color palette, plain language throughout, and multiple input methods supported diverse user needs.

steps.title: Testing & Iteration
steps.description: Conducted extensive accessibility testing with screen readers, keyboard navigation, and users with various disabilities. Achieved 100% task completion rate with assistive technologies.

insights: Inclusive design from the start created better experiences for everyone, not just users with disabilities
Plain language and clear information architecture reduced decision paralysis and confusion
Proper accessibility testing revealed that universal design principles serve all users better
Early accessibility expert involvement prevented costly redesigns and ensured compliance

deliverables.intro: We created a fully accessible patient portal with simplified appointment booking, clear information hierarchy, and support for all assistive technologies. WCAG 2.1 AA compliance was embedded from the start, ensuring access for all users.

results.intro: The redesigned experience delivered measurable improvements across key metrics.
